'Instructions: 
Use the Context provided as follows:
1. Options:
	The correct answer is always included in given list. 
	Use the options to filter out irrelevant details provided in the context.

2. Genes and Variants:
	Only focus on the information about the genes and variants.
	Please ignore the other information.
Context: 
Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Variant rs2187668 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Gene MIR122 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs72929257 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs6932730 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs1794514 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs56036302 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs3891175 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Gene MIR21 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs6809477 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene TSBP1. Gene MIR1299 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease. Gene MIR3909 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease. Gene MIR1183 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease. Variant rs10794501 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease. Disease rheumatic heart disease associates Gene PBX2. Variant rs4494157 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease.. Gene MIR205 associates Disease rheumatic heart disease. Disease ontology identifier of rheumatic heart disease is DOID:0050827. Disease rheumatic heart disease resembles Disease rheumatic fever. 
Question: 
Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with autoimmune hepatitis and rheumatic heart disease. Given list is:  KAT2B, HLA-DQB1,  GSDMB,  ALDH1A2, THADA'
